pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Surrey, British Columbia

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan. A media availability will follow. Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Jonathan Wilkinson will be in attendance.

BC Hydro Trades Training Centre
12591 82 Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
